sentence.Network_en: A whippoorwill came in and sat on the banister and sung.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只夜鹰飞来,落在栏杆上叫个不停.

每日雅思词汇：鸟类词汇_新东方网 ... hummingbird 蜂鸟 whippoorwill 夜鹰 blue jay 有冠蓝背樫鸟.
卡罗琳夜鹰(chuck-will's-widow)、帕乌拉凯夜鹰(pauraque)、弱夜鹰(poorwill)、三声夜鹰(whippoorwill)是北美洲的亲缘种。  夜鹰(Caprimulgusindicus)别名蚊母鸟.
whippoorwill , whippoorwill , both you and I know that Tammy can't let her boyfriend go away from her .夜莺鸟，夜莺鸟，你我都了解苔米，苔米不会让她的男朋友离她而去。

list.abs: only me and the sky , and an old whippoorwill , singing songs in the twilight on Mockingbird Hill .只有我，天空，以及一只夜鹰在黄昏时刻，在反舌鸟山上歌唱着。
only me and the sky , and an old whippoorwill , singing songs in the twilight on Mockingbird Hill .只有我，天空，以及一只夜鹰在黄昏时刻，在反舌鸟山上歌唱着。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: imitative of its call

entry.def: A whippoorwill is a North American bird that is active at night and has a call that sounds like 'whip poor will'.

means.word_mean: 1. American nocturnal goatsucker with gray-and-white plumage
